steps.notes: Mine mare regolith from surface
Screen and separate size fractions
Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Cast rolling element blanks from bearing steel
Precision grind rolling elements to spherical finish
Forge bearing ring blanks from steel bar stock
Turn raceways and bores to near-final dimensions
Harden bearing races to HRC 58-62
Precision grind raceways to final tolerances
Form bearing cage/retainer from steel sheet stock
Assemble races, balls, and cage; pack with grease; install seals

inputs.notes: High-carbon bearing steel for races and rolling elements
Casting feedstock for rolling element blanks

recipe_def.assumptions: Medium bearing set (1.5 kg) for general machinery. Precision ground races and balls, heat-treated to bearing-grade hardness, includes lubrication and seals.
recipe_def.notes: Eight-step recipe covering ring forging, turning, heat treatment, precision grinding, rolling element grinding, cage forming, and final assembly for 35-45mm bore bearings. Uses in-situ steel stock and alloy feedstock; grease and seals still required.
recipe_def.name: Bearing set fabrication v0

recipe_def.assumptions: Relies on BOM bom_rolling_mill_v0.yaml for parts and subassemblies.
recipe_def.notes: Updated to target rolling_mill_v0 to align with BOM bom_rolling_mill_v0.yaml; uses standard assembly steps to build rolling_mill_v0 from BOM components.
recipe_def.name: Rolling mill assembly v0
